meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Matt Collins Blythe Rodgers Liza Veeneman Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6421.

td.p: Matt Collins, a graduate student in economic policy from Cambridge, Massachusetts
Blythe Rodgers, an attorney from Washington, D.C.
Liza Veeneman, a retired software developer from Aliso Viejo, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $12,800)

tr.td: NO. 1 AT THE BOX OFFICE
MAKING THE GRADE
AFFIX THE SUFFIX
"A"-LIST LITERARY CHARACTERS
GEOMETRY
PROTESTING TIPS & ETIQUETTE
